text: Makkal Sakthi or Makkal Sakthi Katchi (Lok Satta Party) is a political party in India founded by Nagabhairava Jaya Prakash Narayan. It will contest 40 constituencies in 18 districts. The party is supported by the non-government organisation 5th Pillar who are famous for issuing zero rupees notes to fight corruption. The party is now headed by Vijay Anand in the state of Tamil Nadu. ==References== Category:Political parties in Tamil Nadu
title: Makkal Sakthi
